As you walk by the front yard of the house, a strange feeling takes you and as more you walk, more you notice that the world are changing. Everything begins to grow. You stop to walk and look around. "Hey, what is happening? What the..."

Your mind are processing the new world as you examine the things around you. You are in a path made of flattened rocks and the grass at your side looks like a jungle.
"Oh God... This is so weird. Why is this happening? And why me? This is the reason of disappearance of kids? I guess not..."
The new reality are adjusting in your mind and quickly you notice that you are in danger. Some animal or bug is now a big threat to you. You can't do anything without help, and there is what you need now: help. The house of your friends are in front of you. The girls are nice, so, they will help and take care of you as you are in this situation. Your heart beats stronger and you still not believing it, but despite of the situation, you must go on.

Then, what will happen next?

As you felt your body being squeezed between the Rachel's massive toes, you could tell that you wouldn't be able to withstand the pressure for long. Her titanic toes wrapped around your body like pythons, slowly squeezing the life out of your insignificant form. Just as you thought that your puny existence was about to be brought to an end by the toes of this massive teen goddess, you felt the strangling digits begin to recede back out of the shoe.

Gasping for breath, you found your relief cut short as the shoe was tilted upside-down. Rachel began to shake her shoe up and down in an attempt to eject whatever uninvited occupant she had felt between her toes. You tried to hold on to the inside of the shoe, more out of fear than anything else, but it was a futile gesture. Within moments, Rachel had shaken you loose and you fell helplessly into the palm of her huge hand. She took a close look at your cowering form before gasping in shock.

"What the heck?! Mark? Is that really you?"

"Y-yeah Rachel, it's me..."

"Wow! How did you get so small? And what were you doing inside of my shoe?"

"W-well, ummm... It's kind of a long story, and-"

"Hold on, Mark. Why are you so scared? Do you really think that I'm going to hurt you?"

"Uhhh, actually..."

"Oh jeez, did I hurt you when you were in my shoe earlier?!"

"Yeah..."

"I'm sorry, Mark! If I had known you were in there, then-"

"No, no, don't worry about it Rachel. It's not like you did it on purpose or anything. I'm just glad that you're such a nice girl."

"*giggle* Thanks Mark, you're sweet. So do you mind telling me how you ended up like this?"

"Sure thing Rachel."

You then proceeded to recount the events that lead up to your current situation. Rachel listened attentively to your story while holding you in the palm of her hand. When you finished talking, she spoke up.

"Wow, so that's what happened? Sorry I didn't notice you when you were hanging onto my foot earlier."

"It's okay Rachel. So, do you think that you can help me get back to normal or something?"


How will Rachel respond?

15.content:
Suddenly, you hear a set of deep, booming footsteps approaching you from behind. As you turn around, you see the colossal form of Mel heading towards you.
As she gets closer, you notice she is wearing a pair of running shoes, white ankle socks, white jeans and a red tank top.
You can't help but stare at her as she walks even closer to you, until you realize she is almost on top of you.
Panicking, you immediately start running in the opposite direction, hoping to outrun those titanic feet.

You don't.

One foot lands right next to you, causing you to stumble as a dark shadow looms over you.
You turn around just in time to see Mel's sole rapidly descending.

STOMP!

You feel your body flatten, and mind-numbing pain shoots through your entire body...
But you feel no broken bones, and your body stays intact.

Unfortunately, you are stuck to the rubber sole.
With each step, you feel yourself pushed deeper into the many cracks of the sole, along with a fresh wave of pain each step.

Mel doesn't know she is smushing you, and walks into the house.

152.content:
Mel closes the door behind her and heads off to her room, humming to herself.
You however, are not as comfortable.

With a body pancaked against the rubber sole of her shoe, your world is a pattern of pain.
A glimpse of the floor, until she brings her foot down again, adding in a fresh wave of pain, followed by darkness.
The grueling sequence repeats over and over again, until you've lost track of where you even are anymore.

Suddenly, Mel stops walking. The last thing you saw before you were pushed into the floor was a fuzzy red carpet.
You hear her sigh.
Without warning, she kicks off her shoes, sending the one you're plastered against spinning towards a wall.
You brace for impact, and the shoe slams sole-first into the hard wall. It tumbles to the floor, and your world finally stops spinning.

Dazed and confused, you see that Mel has arrived in her room. She puts on her favorite pair of black fuzzy slippers and hops onto the bed, where she picks up a magazine and starts listening to her iPod.
You struggle and thrash, and eventually free yourself from the shoe's deathly grip.
As your body unflattens, you flop to the floor, and wait for the pain to end.

After a few minutes, it does.
You wearily stand up and look around. Mel hasn't noticed you, which you're not sure is a good thing or a bad thing. That girl had always been a bit of a brat, and you saw what she did to any spiders she saw.
However, she might be your key to salvation...

What do you do?

info.brief_description: An orphan boy mysteriously shrunk at a house where all of his friends are girls.
info.description:
You are Mark, a 15 years old boy. Living in a orphanage, you have seen some strange problems at your home. Some boys or girls have been disappeared. There are rumors that the direction of the orphanage is reducing expenses and therefore have given a disappearance in some kids. You do not care too much about it and goes on with your life until...

Primary characters:

Mark (you), 15 years old. A gentle and polite boy.

Amy, 16 years old. A girl who's a little overweight, but with a nice curvy body. She is calm and have a wide and meaty soles with nice pedicured toes. Likes to wear tropical flip flops.

Rachel, 15 years old. A sweet and adorable girl. She have a long and cute sole. Likes to walk barefoot in the house.

Mel, 13 years old. A girl with energy. She is a little brat, but have the most pretty feet of the family. Likes to wear sneakers, socks and fuzzy slippers.

Marissa, 42 years old. The mother of the girls and have a proud and fair nature. She have a sexy feet with wrinkled soles. Likes to wear stylish high heels, shoes, slippers and pumps.

The Rules are simple:

Allowed: Feet (focus), boobs, vore, digestion, ass, anal, toilet. New characters and characters from your own stories.

Not allowed: Sex, giant male interaction, girl growing, and two line chapters may be edited or deleted.

Be creative and have fun!
